title: Talkhab and Shirin (Gilaki Flight)

source_text.text:
Talkhab loves Shirin, but she is promised to a brutal lord. An old woman gives Shirin a pouch of pepper, a spindle, and a flask of water to use if she must flee.
On the wedding night, Shirin and Talkhab escape with a loyal servant. The lord wakes and pursues on horseback.
Shirin throws the pepper— it whips into a blinding sandstorm. She throws the spindle— it becomes a steep mountain ridge. She throws the water— it spreads into a wide river. The pursuer, cut off and stinging, turns back.
Safe in a neighboring village, Shirin and Talkhab marry freely; the community sides with them against coercion.

source_text_persian.text: تلخاب و شیرین از دست خان می‌گریزند؛ پیرزن به شیرین فلفل، دوک و آب می‌دهد. فلفل طوفان شن، دوک کوه و آب رود می‌شود و خان جا می‌ماند. آن دو به روستای امن می‌رسند و آزادانه ازدواج می‌کنند.
